meta.content: Jeopardy Archive Woody Bell Rachel Hirsch Meredith Larson Final clue response question answer Daily Double

meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #6729.

td.p: Woody Bell, an Air Force officer from Columbia, Maryland
Rachel Hirsch, a high school history teacher from Cambridge, Massachusetts
Meredith Larson, an attorney from Washington, D.C. (whose 2-day cash winnings total $42,701)

tr.td: HAPPY DECEMBER, EVERYBODY!
T.C.L.T.
(Alex: Twentieth century literary titles.)
TV BARS & SALOONS
THE KILLING
CHOP WOOD
CARRY "WATER"

body.div: The J! Archive is created by fans, for fans. The Jeopardy! game show and all elements thereof, including but not limited to copyright and trademark thereto, are the property of Jeopardy Productions, Inc. and are protected under law. This website is not affiliated with, sponsored by, or operated by Jeopardy Productions, Inc. Join the discussion at JBoard.tv.
